longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Holders of Hong Kong (SAR China) or
Macao (SAR China) passports can obtain a visa on arrival for a
max. stay of 7 days, provided holding a return/onward ticket.
Extension of stay possible for additional 90 days. Fee: varies
between XOF 10,000.- and XOF 90,000.- depending on duration of
stay.
Minors:
- Children under 15 years of age, travelling alone or
  accompanied by adults, must hold either a passport or a
  "Carnet de Voyage".
- Minors of visa required nationalities do not need their own
  visa if their details and photo are included in parent's
  passport and traveling with the parent.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold documents required for their
  next destination
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required. 

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
